summary.description:
Provides a complete, quality checked and regularly updated list of oligonucleotides for the Ebola virus. The database describes the genetic diversity across the Ebola genome to facilitate the design of accurate diagnostic methods and therapeutic approaches.
The database provides different measures of sequence conservation for each target region obtained from multiple sequence alignments, allowing the selection of the most conserved oligonucleotides.
summary.name: EbolaID
